BugReport.Title: Cannot log in to the application
BugReport.Description: When I try to log in to the application using my valid credentials, I receive an error message "Invalid username or password". I have double-checked my credentials and they are correct. I have also tried resetting my password, but the issue persists.
BugReport.ExpectedResult: User should be logged in to the application.
BugReport.ActualResult: User is unable to log in to the application.
